changes: Issue #87: Add project-specific custom commands and lifecycle hooks
New /tiki:hook-run command for manual hook testing
8 lifecycle hooks: pre-ship, post-ship, pre-execute, post-execute, pre-commit, post-commit, phase-start, phase-complete
Cross-platform support: Git Bash and PowerShell on Windows
Environment variables passed to hooks (TIKI_ISSUE_NUMBER, TIKI_PHASE_NUMBER, etc.)
Hook integration in ship.md, execute.md, and commit.md
New schemas: hook-result.schema.json, extensions in config.schema.json
Custom commands support via .tiki/commands/
New /tiki:release-review command for batch review of all issues in a release
Runs /tiki:review-issue for each issue automatically
Deep-dives on warnings/blockers with code analysis
Posts decisions as GitHub comments
Displays summary table with verdicts
Issue #86: Add institutional knowledge system with automatic capture
New /tiki:knowledge command (add/edit/show/list/search/archive)
KNOWLEDGE: marker extraction during phase execution
Auto-synthesis of knowledge entries on ship
Knowledge retrieval in plan-issue (Step 2.35) and review-issue (Step 4.7)
Config options: knowledge.autoCapture, captureOnShip, minPhasesForCapture
Schemas: knowledge.schema.json, knowledge-index.schema.json
6 new conditional prompts for knowledge workflows
Enhanced /tiki:new-project with full greenfield workflow
Deep questioning phase for conversational project discovery
4-agent parallel research for domain ecosystem analysis
Interactive requirements scoping by feature category
GitHub issue generation from requirements
New conditional prompts: deep-questioning.md, research-agents.md, feature-scoping.md, issue-generation.md
Added docs/Starting-a-New-Project.md wiki page
Release v1.7: Final command refactoring batch (9 commands, avg 56% reduction)
Issue #76: Refactor update-claude.md (79% reduction)
Issue #77: Refactor state.md (74% reduction)
Issue #78: Refactor adr.md (65% reduction)
Issue #79: Refactor pick-issue.md (49% reduction)
Issue #80: Refactor resume.md (54% reduction)
Issue #81: Refactor skip-phase.md (47% reduction)
Issue #82: Refactor commit.md (49% reduction)
Issue #83: Refactor add-todo.md (42% reduction)
Issue #84: Refactor update-tiki.md (43% reduction)
Release v1.6: Command refactoring batch (12 commands refactored)
Issue #49: Refactor release-yolo.md for context window efficiency (87% token reduction)
Issue #48: Refactor debug.md for context window efficiency (92% token reduction)
Issue #47: Refactor research.md for context window efficiency (90% token reduction)
Issue #46: Refactor define-requirements.md for context window efficiency (88% token reduction)
Issue #45: Refactor plan-issue.md for context window efficiency (76% token reduction)
Issue #44: Refactor execute.md for context window efficiency (92% token reduction)
Issue #38: Split release.md into 7 focused command files (release-new, release-status, release-add, release-remove, release-ship, release-yolo, release-sync)
Issue #34: Add Diagnostic Agent documentation to execute.md
Issue #36: Add JSON schema validation for .tiki/ state files
Issue #24: Add parallel task execution within phases
Issue #23: Add /tiki:verify for structured user acceptance testing
Issue #27: Add phase assumptions listing to planning workflow
Issue #26: Expand /tiki:map-codebase to generate additional documentation
Issue #28: Add /tiki:changelog command to show recent updates
Issue #43: Add /tiki:roadmap for multi-release project visualization
Issue #42: Add release automation and command integration (/tiki:release yolo, sync, state/whats-next)
Issue #41: Add core release management system (/tiki:release)
Issue #40: Add requirements definition system (/tiki:define-requirements)
Issue #29: Add context window status display with proxy metrics
Issue #33: Add success criteria documentation to README
Issue #35: Fix auto-fix test expectations to match three-tier strategy
Issue #37: Move STACK.md and CONCERNS.md output to .tiki/ folder
Issue #25: Add /tiki:add-todo and /tiki:list-todos for backlog management
Issue #17: Add emoji-based progress notifications to auto-fix UX
Issue #16: Add filter flags and category batch operations to review-queue
Issue #15: Add trigger processing to review-queue for ADRs and CLAUDE.md updates
Issue #14: Detect ADR and Update-Claude triggers during phase execution
Issue #12: Add auto-fix infrastructure for verification failures
Initial release
Core workflow commands: get-issue, plan-issue, execute
Execution control: pause, resume, skip-phase, redo-phase, heal
Planning tools: audit-plan, discuss-phases
Code quality: assess-code, map-codebase
Documentation: adr, update-claude, commit
TDD support with test-creator
Self-update capability with update-tiki
